poem:
**Bullies and Shadows**

In corridors of power,  
where whispers echo,  
they sense the tremor  
beneath our skin,  
an unseen pulse  
guiding their advance—  
We must not flinch  
or shrink as night  
lengthens its reach;  
the world awaits  
our steadfast glow  
within the gathering dusk.
